attributes.review: I personally think that deleting Tik Tok is bad and trump has no excuse to do it he’s just mad cuz many people didn’t go to his rally we didn’t force them to do anything they just wanted to you don’t have to punish everyone just because people didn’t go he’s selfish and shouldn’t be the president if he doesn’t give everyone rights and still wants racism to happen.
attributes.title: Trump 2020! in a graveyard✨💥🌈

attributes.review:
I got this app so i can support my lord and savior donald dump truck. i got all these really weird adds talking about really creepy and sexual things and it was definitely not a good look. but i decided to keep trying to push on through the app when all the sudden...
MY PHONE CAUGHT ON FIRE!!
this app is terrible and i can’t believe i need to buy a new phone now, you have lost my vote sir.
IMPORTANT SIDE NOTE:
blm, acab, djt is a white supremacist!
attributes.title: BURN🌿✨🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: This app truly took years away from my life. The photos and content included in this app made me wish I was never born and frankly, my eyes still burn from it. It was easily decided that I had no choice but to delete it, especially since I have no interest in supporting our current president. For those who willingly downloaded this, please get well soon.
attributes.title: Disgusting 😌✨

attributes.review: I hate this app so much every time I try to open it it crashes every time I tried to click on a link it crashes every time I go to interact with the content it crashes. The ads are ridiculous I can’t go through one article without it crashing it’s ridiculous Trump is a billionaire and he does not need all this money. Anyway f this app f Trump
attributes.title: I hate this app with a passion

attributes.review: I found this app to keep up with Bunker Boy 😉 and when I got on I saw him everywhere and I was like   “This is nasty” 🤢 nun on the pictures were good and the app had terrible quality. I’ve seen better quality on my ds than on this app. So the main 2 complaints are bunker boys pics were all over and the quality of this app is worse than the first tv 📺
attributes.title: Bunker Boy and Bad Quality 🤮

attributes.review:

attributes.title: The Pedo Cheeto man DO NOT GET 🧨📿🔬

attributes.review: When I opened the app, the whole entire script of the Bee Movie played out and I don’t even know how. It completely shut my phone down and had me waiting for an 1hr for it to turn back on. After I turned it back on, I decided to try the app again. Not only was I disappointed, but I was disgusted to see Trump’s shrimp pic wide open on the screen shoved in my face.😾😾
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: the first thing i see when i open the app is some ugly big orange guy 😡🤢🤢 literally makes me sick to my stomach and almost made me throw up. Second of all it was a very slow and dumb app just like who the app is named after 😐😐 i definitely don’t recommend and the little app picture is just so ugly i don’t even want to look at it.  0/10 i hate it.
attributes.title: horrible app.. i hate it

attributes.review: this app should be illegal. when i opened up to the app i saw a big orange creature on the screen. it was very unsettling and disgusting. i immediately deleted the app. it gave a very bad first impression. when people open the app i don't think they will like to see a large cheeto puff staring at them while they look at the screen. it is just disgusting and horrifying and i need to bleach my eyes.
attributes.title: absolutely NOT

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to inform myself about the Cheeto man and when I opened it, it asked me a serial of questions that were too personal but I disregarded it and went on until it asked me if I had epilepsy.😐 I thought okay.. this is weird how do they know that but I put yes and then the screen started flashing bright lights !! While this is happening Cheeto man breaks into my house and eats my left over chicken ://
attributes.title: EPILEPSY ALERT🚨🚨🚨
